subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Mike Edwards Files/who are you that said yes that i can turn the radio off.wav 
  Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
  Description : I asked if I could turn the radio off, and a woman said Yes. I then asked her name. Do any of you hear her name clear enough to tell me what you think it is? 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/who%20are%20you%20that%20said%20yes%20that%20i%20can%20turn%20the%20radio%20off.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...>
